docs.snippet: Confronted by one of his first foreign crises, President Donald Trump on Tuesday split the blame for Syria's worst chemical weapons attack in years between its Russian-backed leader and former President Barack Obama, as the new American administra...
docs.lead_paragraph: Confronted by one of his first foreign crises, President Donald Trump on Tuesday split the blame for Syria's worst chemical weapons attack in years between its Russian-backed leader and former President Barack Obama, as the new American administration struggled to explain what it might do in response.

headline.main: Trump Blames Assad and Obama for Chemical Attack in Syria
headline.print_headline: Trump Blames Assad and Obama for Chemical Attack in Syria

docs.snippet: The Trump administration veered toward deeper conflict with Russia Tuesday as Secretary of State Rex Tillerson arrived in Moscow, gambling that an unpredictable new president armed with the willingness to threaten military action gives the U.S. mu...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Trump administration veered toward deeper conflict with Russia Tuesday as Secretary of State Rex Tillerson arrived in Moscow, gambling that an unpredictable new president armed with the willingness to threaten military action gives the U.S. much-needed leverage to end Syria's carnage.

headline.main: Tillerson in Moscow: Pushing on Syria Where Obama Failed
headline.print_headline: Tillerson in Moscow: Pushing on Syria Where Obama Failed

docs.snippet: Former Obama administration officials are pushing back against criticism of the former president, saying they proposed similar airstrikes in Syria to the ones President Donald Trump ordered this week, but were stymied by a Republican-controlled Co...
docs.lead_paragraph: Former Obama administration officials are pushing back against criticism of the former president, saying they proposed similar airstrikes in Syria to the ones President Donald Trump ordered this week, but were stymied by a Republican-controlled Congress reluctant to go along with the Democratic president's plan.

headline.main: Obama Aides Push Back Against Criticism of Inaction on Syria
headline.print_headline: Obama Aides Push Back Against Criticism of Inaction on Syria
